title: Edgar Ramirez is in talks to board The Girl on the Train film
text:
Friday, Oct 23 2015, 08:17 BST Share on Facebook Share on Google+ Edgar Ramirez could be boarding The Girl on the Train .The Zero Dark Thirty star is currently up for a role in the adaptation of Paula Hawkins's bestselling thriller, reports Deadline . 
© Araya Diaz/WireImage The Girl on the Train is already set to star Emily Blunt as Rachel , whose wistful dreaming about a young couple she passes each morning on her commute is shattered one horrific day when the wife goes missing.Ramirez would portray Dr Kamal Abdic, a therapist who is involved in an affair with the married Megan (Haley Bennett), and becomes a suspect in her disappearanceAlso lined up to appear in The Girl on the Train is Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation star Rebecca Ferguson , while Jared Leto and Chris Evans have also been linked with the film. 
© Alberto E. Rodriguez/Getty Images for A&E Network Get On Up director Tate Taylor is bringing Erin Cressida Wilson's screenplay to life for the big screen.This year is a busy one for Ramirez with several films already under his belt, including the Point Break remake and Joy with Jennifer Lawrence.He is also currently filming treasure hunt thriller Gold with Matthew McConaughey and Bryce Dallas Howard.Watch the trailer for Edgar Ramirez's Joy below:
